short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grayrify: prevent addiction to selected websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"I've gone gray, and it's great!"* This app prevents addiction to customizable websites by turning them into grayscale. From the New York Times*, this makes the glittering websites less stimulating. Works for Tiktok, IG, Facebook, Youtube, or any websites you'd like to try.

*NY TImes - "Is the Answer to Phone Addiction a Worse Phone?"
